intro.about: Vegas Foundation is a globally leading innovative financial institution dedicated to providing innovative financial services and asset management solutions for the global casino and gaming industry. The core goal of the foundation is to promote transparency, security, and stable profitability in the gaming industry!
intro.team: The founding team of Vegas Foundation includes globally renowned financial experts and an international professional operations team, committed to delivering high returns to partners and investors through its unique fund management system.

notice: Dear Vegas Family: The upgrade has been successfully completed. The V1 version will soon be discontinued. For family members who experienced a loss of their initial deposit on their first bet, please send 1 USDT to the official payment address, and we will refund the principal to your earnings address. The V2 beta version has disabled reinvestment, direct referral earnings, and differential earnings. All family members are requested to use the official version for betting, as it correctly identifies network relationships and ensures normal earnings. Differential earnings will be gradually unlocked in the following month based on the 3rd, 7th, 10th, and 15th generations. We hope to provide you with a pleasant experience.
